item.value: Please try to deploy the project from this archive
Пожалуйста попрробуйте развернуть проект из этого архива

In this regard, we have small misunderstandings about which categories we need to implement filtering. I see two types of categories in Bidspirit. Filtering by one type is implemented in our plugin. The second type of category, which is referred to as tags, is used by only a few Bidspirit clients and mainly in Israel.
Второй тип категорий, который именуется как теги, используют лишь не многие клиенты Bidspirit и преимущественно в Израиле.

In this regard, we have small misunderstandings about which categories we need to implement filtering. I see two types of categories in Bidspirit. Filtering by one type is implemented in our plugin. The second type of categories is used only by a few Bidspirit clients and mainly in Israel.

В этом плане у нас небольшие недопонимания на счёт того по каким категориям нам надо реализовать фильтрацию. Я в Bidspirit вижу возможность использовать два типа категорий. Фильтрация по одному типу у нас в плагине реализована. Второй тип категорий используют лишь не многие клиенты Bidspirit и преимущественно в Израиле.
What category fields do you fill in Bidspirit?
Какие поля с категориями вы заполняете в Bidspirit?
Can we return to solving the problem with authorization in the application?
Мы можем вернуть к решению проблемы с авторизацией в приложении?
Please check now. Now it remains to correct this page in the adaptive.
Теперь осталось в адптиве подправить эту страницу.
Я проверил эту фичу на сайте и она работает.
When editing this element, you can make a mistake by deleting an extra character and break the form.
При редактировании этого элемента можно допустить ошибку, удалив лишний символ, и поломать форму.
Please send us the text you want to place for this element.
Пожалуйста, пришлите нам текст, который вы хотите разместить для этого элемента.
Please send us text why you place for this element.
Please send us text how you place for this element.
We will send for you example
We send for you example
Featured items делаются вот так
We have question about request "auctionssetAuctionAlert" and he required parameter sessionId. Can we enable a notification for all users when the auction is synchronized from the server side.
Можем ли мы включить оповещение для всех пользователей при синхронизации аукциона со стороны сервера.
Can we enable alert for all users
The preferred language of the recipients of this notification. If the auction house supports 2 languages - 2 notifications would be sent

I get incorrect value in filed lang for webhook response LEADING_BID_SURPASSED
move to for only user app
What do we have with the authorization error in the application? Have you checked cookies in last test application build?
Please fix mistake
Have you checked cookies in last test application build?
Have you checked cookies in last build test application?
Have you checked cookies?
Вы проверили cookies?
What do we have with the authorization error in the application?
Что у нас с ошибкой авторизации в приложении?

An alert which informs the user he is no longer the leading bidder for a certain lot. This alert is sent to the leading user if he sets it in his preference using the userssetLeadingBidAlertEnabled api.

A notification before the live auction of an item starts soon. Sent to all users that requested to be notified (using the itemssetItemAlert api) In general the notification i sent 5 items before the alerted item goes live (e.g. lot 10 would get a notification when lot 5 goes live) The only exception is for the first 5 items - they all get notifications (if needed) when the first item of the auction goes live.
Sets or cancels an alert for this item. if an alert is set, the user would get an alert before the item goes live on auction. See Bidspirit webhooks for more information
A notification before the auction starts for all users that requested to be notified (using the auctionssetAuctionAlert api). The notification is sent 30 minutes before the auction starts.
Expected response format:

The Api should respond with a json encoded http response. it must have the field success to indicate if the webhook call was successful. In case there was an error processing the api, the webhook expects the response to put a short description as an error field
I was confused by this error and I fixed it.
Меня смущала вот эта ошибка и я её исправил.
Пожалуйста дайте мне знать если я где то ошибся.
In this case, let's enable the test site to accept webhooks.
В таком случае давайте разрешим для тестового сайта принимать webhooks.

Configuration: Configuration of the webhooks is done through bidspirit admin. In order to enable webhook calls the party implementing the api needs to provide a bidspirit admin the endpoint webhook url and an authentication token

Bidspirit enables external api systems to accept webhook api calls for specific events. all webhook calls are post http requests carrying a json object. The json always include a field notificationType which can be one of TEST, LEADING_BID_UPDATE, AUCTION_STARTS_SOON, or ITEM_LIVE_SOON Each webhook request also carries a X-BIDSPIRIT-SIGNATURE header which should be used for authentication of the request (see below).
